adBanners.title: 50% Off on Sushi Platters
adBanners.description: Enjoy half-price sushi platters every Tuesday at participating restaurants. Order now to claim this exclusive offer!

adBanners.title: Free Delivery Weekend
adBanners.description: Get free delivery on all orders over $15 this weekend. No promo code needed!

adBanners.title: New: Craft Burgers
adBanners.description: Try our new selection of gourmet craft burgers made with locally sourced ingredients. Available now!

adBanners.title: Healthy Bowls Collection
adBanners.description: Discover our new range of nutritious and delicious bowls. Perfect for a balanced meal!

adBanners.title: Coffee Happy Hour
adBanners.description: Get any coffee at half price between 2-4 PM daily. Perfect for your afternoon pick-me-up!
